DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of product 0405 in pediatric subjects with Mild to Moderate Atopic Dermatitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Product 0405 to a Vehicle Control in the Treatment of Mild to Moderate Atopic Dermatitis in Pediatric Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment medication will be administered topically twice daily for 28 days
DOC.criteria: Clinical Diagnosis of Atopic Dermatitis Good health with the exception of Atopic Dermatitis Percent body surface area minimum requirements Subjects who are pregnant, nursing or planning a pregnancy
